verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: In my heart, In my heart newline There's a fire burning newline A passion deep within my soul newline Not slowing down, not growing cold

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: An unquenchable flame that keeps burning brighter newline A love that's blazing like the sun newline For who you are and what you've done.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: And as the fire is raging on newline So your priase becomes my song

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: The whole earth is filled with your glory Lord newline Angels and men adore, newline Creation longs for what's in store

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: May you be honored and glorified newline Exalted and lifted high newline Here at Your feet I lay my life.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: From the ends of the earth newline To the heights of heaven newline Your glory Lord is far and wide newline Through history you reign on high

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: From the depths of the sea newline To the mountain's summit newline Your power Lord it knows no bounds newline A higher love cannot be found

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: So let the universe proclaim newline Your great power, and Your great name
